meta.article_title: February 27, 2017 - Forehand Follow-Through Back into Position

forehand_follow_through_back_into_positi.probleme: Not returning to a neutral position quickly enough for the next shot

debutant.nom: Practice using momentum from swing to move back into position

exercices_complementaires.nom: Forehand shot with emphasis on following through and moving back into position
exercices_complementaires.description: Use momentum from swing to move back into position after forehand shot

erreurs_a_eviter.nom: Failing to use momentum from swing to move back into position
